class.name: Vector2i
class.description: 2-element structure that can be used to represent 2D grid coordinates or pairs of integers.

method.name: Vector2i
method.description: Constructs a new Vector2i from the given x and y.

method.name: abs
method.description: Returns a new vector with all components in absolute values (i.e. positive).

method.name: aspect
method.description: Returns the ratio of x to y.

method.name: cross
method.description: Returns the 2 dimensional analog of the cross product with the given vector.

method.name: distance_squared_to
method.description: Returns the squared distance to vector [code]b[/code]. Prefer this function over [method distance_to] if you need to sort vectors or need the squared distance for some formula.

method.name: dot
method.description: Returns the dot product with vector [code]b[/code].

method.name: length_squared
method.description: Returns the vector's length squared. Prefer this function over [member length] if you need to sort vectors or need the squared length for some formula.

method.name: max_axis
method.description: Returns the vector with each component set to one or negative one, depending on the signs of the components.

method.name: tangent
method.description: Returns this Vector2i converted into a Vector2.
